title: Luger (Eclipse)
description:
The ECUP shakes the rain off its mac, lights a fire and pours itself a bourbon, with 'Luger'!

Luger was a three-issue mini published by Eclipse in 1986-87. It was written by Bruce Jones, illustrated by Bo Hampton and was about, in the oh-so-succinct words of the Grand Comics Database, "John Luger, a rough and tumble soldier of fortune".

Many thanks to the creators and scanners! Get it, seed it!
